text:
The editor is great! built an email for a client in 30mins :slightly_smiling_face: didn’t have to think about nested tables or anything!

Any chance the bulletproof background images fix will be applied to the body pattern images?
<https://app.HubSpot.com/email/268156/edit-beta/8153339377/content>
It would be great to be able to use background images, I guess i’ll have to build a custom module as a workaround
Looks like i can’t make a custom module as the editor adds it’s own padding to custom modules, it would be good if you could remove it like on the default image module
